name: Dating Doors English Ver.
description:
A dating sim with doors !

Choose you door and start your adventure !

"Doors finally became video game protagonists !" Door Game Story Magazine

"Finally, doors aren't background items anymore, and that's cool !"  NoEscape (Door Youtuber)

"Ok, It's a good thing that doors are highlighted, but as always we are left behind"  Doorknob visibility committee

Music credits :
CAMeLIA http://agnello-pecora.chu.jp/CAMeLIA/index.html
